eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: The volcano is about to erupt. Dolly saves Eyjafjalla, blocking the falling rocks. Eyjafjalla finds that her mother's old protective clothing she now wears, is the answer for the 'fur.' Enis exhausts himself and passes out saving his sister. The street's pedestrians end their journey, and everyone in Siesta bids farewell to the Old Siesta.

attributes.content: Oof... This is just the right temperature. Hot springs are fun, but the temperature's a tad bit too peaceful.
This temperature keeps my head clear. Helps me think about the real important questions.
Say... Which did the planet birth first? Lava or rocks?

Let's start from the very beginning. 'Lava' wasn't 'lava,' and 'rock' wasn't 'rock.' All thing are a cycle, and they take different shapes during their changes, and so they were given different names.

Man is always trying to use assertive language to delimit the indescribable natures of the world, almost like it's the only way they can get a good night's sleep. This, too, goes to show their lack of wisdom...
Hey, watch out there. Don't splash all that lava everywhere. It's dangerous. It's not that likely, but what if someone just happens to walk byâ€”
Hm? What's with the ruckus... Is somebody trying to join us?

The enormous monster beneath their feet is breathing heavier and heavier by the second. The temperature in their surroundings has risen quite a bit. The lava spewed out from the volcano's crater rapidly cools and turns into rocks that come rolling down.
Kahn, Professor Keller... This place is dangerous... We should leave...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Adele, you get out of here first. This is something that I need to settle with her, right here and now!
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn, don't be absurd!
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: When you left them there on Mount Unna, what they had to face was much worse!
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Do you even have a conscience? Is admitting to what you've done harder than facing death?!
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn... We need to hurry...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I won't be able to block the next wave...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Watch out! Behind you!
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Adele lifts her staff, but the rocks are falling like rain. Her Originium Arts are unable to melt all of them down.
She focuses on protecting her allies, yet she can't hear their warnings or the sound of the danger behind her.
I saw you the past few days, but it looks like nobody else can.
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: I don't know where you came from, but you're the only one who's willing to hang out with me. I know, you like strawberry ice cream, too, right?
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: (Lies down obediently)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: Look, our home used to be right under that volcano there, but it's going to go away soon.
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: I actually know... I was abandoned there, and Harley and Enis found me.
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: I don't know why I was abandoned, but if my real parents ever come looking for me, will they still be able to find me?
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: *sigh*... Daddy is gone, and Enis is leaving. Little lamb, where do you think our home really is? Where is the friend who ate strawberry ice cream with me a long time ago?
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: (Unsatisfied groan)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: Heyâ€”
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: The ocean doesn't answer her. It merely sits between the two Siestas as always.
Suddenly, the girl notices that the calm, quiet shoreline has gotten closer to her at some point. The seawater gradually drowned the dry surface and has reached her feet.
Hmm...?
attributes.name: Dejected Little Girl

attributes.content: Liv!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Their surroundings suddenly fall silent.
The bubbling lava, the falling rocks. All of it are suddenly without sound whatsoever, as though time itself has ground to a halt.

Adele isn't sure if it is her hearing aids that have failed or that she has once again fallen into a dream. All she can feel is that she is enveloped by a formless warmth, as though she has fallen into a cozy mattress.
Poor little one, you seem to be frightened. *sigh*, why did you climb the volcano at a time like this?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly? So this is where you've been!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I thought you'd left... Where are Keller and Kahn?! Did the lambs cause the volcanic anomaly? I... Am I already dead...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hey, hey! Calm down, little one. I know you have a lot of questions, but slow down. We'll take it one step at a time.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: You are alive and well, and so are your buddies, but I won't let them see me. Once they wake up from this, all they'll think is that they had a nice little nap.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: As for all that strange equipment on the volcano... Terribly sorry. I told them to be extra carefulâ€”I'm not lying this time!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: But I wasn't able to keep them in check. They were being so rowdy with their fun... And I'm not lying about this, either.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Having fun... on a volcano?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Of course! Didn't I tell you? This is second best thing on the planet! Volcano surfing!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Adele lifts her head up and looks into the distance. There is lava gushing out of the crater sporadically, but she can faintly make out silhouettes of critters enjoying themselves. At the same time, there are many more creatures happily making their way toward the crater.
The mountain is covered in a blanket of white wool, almost like clouds have come falling down from the sky and draped themselves over it.
Mr. Dolly, these sheep aren't just your clones, are they...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Ohh? You've realized it, have you?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Just as I said, I've met a lot of interesting folk during the long, long time I've been around.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Oh, don't get the wrong idea. They aren't 'souls' or anything.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: There's no way to keep lives that have been lost. I simply copied how they looked and made all these little ones... It's like... a personal collection? I thought you'd like them.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: That sounds... kind of cruel...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Look at me talking on and on. I only just noticed that you've found the fur too. Yeah... it's been way too long since the last time I saw them.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Just then, another scar appears on her old, tattered protective gear.
I should've guessed.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's an apt metaphor, isn't it? Animals need very thick fur to protect themselvesâ€”same for humans.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: When I see you standing here like that, it's like I'm looking at those two old friends of mine. I really miss them.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Oh, you earn no praise from me for inheriting their exquisite mantle. It's just I'm guessing you miss them too. Poor girl, why can't you just open up and admit it?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: No need to act tough. You shouldn't keep yourself so on edge, either. No one will deny a girl your age the right to feel sad or afraid. You need to learn to not act tough.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: If you're tired, stop and take a break or cry your heart out.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly, is this scavenger hunt just a game?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's true that it's not really all that mysterious of a puzzle. I just wanted you to have some fun, Adele.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I had lots of fun during my time in Siesta.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I don't understand. Why are you taking such good care of me in particular...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's simple. A girl as lovely as you is a rare sight on this world.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Misfortune may find you often... but you have no less love than anybody else.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Actually, I saw you a long time ago, back in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: A little girl always earnestly reading her books in that tiny, little spire.
As the child of two genius academics, many had high expectations of her. She was seen as a gifted Caster and scholar.

Outstanding, remarkably talented individuals like her are always burdened with achieving results to match their talent. Even if they are inflicted with an incurable disease, they are seen by others as a tenacious role model.
Young Adele, has anyone ever asked you what you wanted?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Take a look. There are so many people and so many lives all around the world. You know volcanoes like the back of your hoof, but there are so many fun things out there besides volcanoes. Why not see for yourself?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Thanks... Mr. Dolly. I've... had a lot of fun these past few days...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I can smell half a lie. Just half, but we'll leave it like this for now.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: It's nearly time. I really wanted to invite you to come try lava surfing with me, but the human body is too weak.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I'll take you three somewhere safe. Then, I'll have to be ready for the opening of Volcano Paradise.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: So long, Adele.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Thanks, Mr. Dolly... Will we meet again?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Perhaps... No, maybe I should say we will meet again for sure.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I hope that the next time we meet, I will get to see a truly happy Adele.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Promise me this?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: The fluffy creature shakes its body a little, walks forward a few steps, and lightly brushes the girl's cheek with its snout.
Oh! I almost forgot. I owe you a reward for finding all three things.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly, do you know anything else about... the death of my parents?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hrmm...
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: What I mean is... The thing you've been looking for... isn't 'Volcano Watchers?'
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: You've been talking about Volcano Watchers?!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: S-Surprise...?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: There used to be a lot of Volcano Watchers growing on Mount Siesta's hills. They look pretty, and they are tasty. That's why the little ones ate most of them up.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Then I realized if they kept on eating them, it wouldn't be long before they went extinct. That's why I planted some of them in a secret spot behind their backs.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: So the Volcano Watchers aren't extinct yet... That's good news...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Then where did you plant the flowers?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Oh, just on top of a hill around the back of the volcano.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: By volcano... You mean this one, the one that's about to erupt...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Er... yeah.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Enis?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Are you... leaving...?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (Out of breath)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Why did you... run out here all by yourself...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I thought... you weren't ever going to come back.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Are you kidding me...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: When you're on the adventure team... you never work alone.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Let's go home.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: The seawater has risen above their soles, making it difficult to even walk.
Hurry!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: At first, the waves were just a hazy line at the far reach of their vision, but in just the blink of an eye, they are right here in front of them.
Enis tightly clutches his sister as the waves beat against his less than robust back, causing him to stagger.
Another, taller wave is approaching them.
(There's no way...)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Let's try thisâ€”)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis tries his hardest to feel the 'rock' in his body. It's close to his heart. Every time his heart beats, he can feel its hard texture.
A rock the size of a man rises from the ground in front of the siblings and immediately crumbles just barely withstanding the crashing of the wave.
There is an intense pain in his chest.
Enis!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Look... Didn't I tell you...? I know magic...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis wipes the blood on his face and pulls his sister so she isn't hurt by the crumbling gravel.
Quick, hide behind me!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: One, two...
Seemingly formed by the white waves, a countless number of fluffy creatures rush toward them from the coast. They stack together and form a wall, or more precisely, a dam.
The waves clash against the furry dam, completely absorbed by it the very next second.
I must've gone crazy...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What exactly is this...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Having absorbed the seawater, their white wool has grown even puffier, enough to keep the siblings safe from the dangerous waves.
After who knows how long, the ground has finally stopped shaking, and the waves gradually start to calm.
Are... Are we saved?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Shivers) (Shakes to dry body)
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Th-Thank you...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Happy bleat)
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Just like cotton candy dissolving in the water, the beastling suddenly disappears.
I guess that's... a near-death hallucination...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The night deepens, and at some point in time, the bustling crowd's clamor gradually started to fade.
Someone has taken out a guitar and started playing a gentle melody.
Almost like some kind of tacit understanding, everyone looks in the same direction.
A pillar of smoke gradually rises from the volcano's caldera, followed by spews of dark red and ash gray. The ground is trembling slightly underneath their feet.
We're so far out. We definitely won't get caught in that, right...?
attributes.name: Perturbed Passerby

attributes.content: *sigh*... It still came.
attributes.name: Regretful Passerby

attributes.content: Oh... It really erupted...
attributes.name: Male Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: The people in the crowd hold the hands of those around them. Parents hug their children tight, as pedestrians begin to hold their breaths.

As though they all finally feel a weight off their shoulders, or perhaps like a giant boulder has finally crushed their hearts, sighs and quiet mumblings can be heard amongst the crowd, yet this just makes the whole street seem even more quiet.
This continues for a very, very long time, until the crowd snaps back from the sight before them.

I can still recall that back when I was a young boy... my parents would take me to this little hill. It was full of flowers and trees whose names I never knew. There were so many of them, and they smelled so wonderful every spring.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: My father was allergic to their pollen, so he would wait for us at the bottom of the hill. My mother and I would bend the flowers' branches and weave garlands. We ran and ran across the hill, and waved down to the bottom of the hill...
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: ...That won't ever happen again...
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Mr. Tom...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: It's nothing, girl. I'm just thinking about the past... I used to sell ice cream every day, meeting all kinds of children.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Now my children are all in Columbia. They didn't come back home, even for a time like this.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Sir, your children are far away. It's possible that they didn't know Siesta's volcano was going to erupt today. The might be on their way, or they could have a package still in transit...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I came here because I wanted to build a logistics center that connected all regions and shortened the distances between them.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Maybe someday, you'll get things from different places more quickly, and your children will know how you're doing that much faster.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: But we're still a long way away from achieving that... Just now, I was thinking that I might be able to do something to help...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: What's that...?
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: If anyone needs to send a postcard to family abroad, Mountaincomm Trade could deliver them for free the next few days.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: By the time they get them, or when they come back after they get their postcards, Siesta will be a better place than it is now.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I'll do my best to make this a better place, too. It's a small wish of mine, aside from my commercial ambitions.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Thanks, kid.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: It's such a nice thing to be able to write your family...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: When I was studying in Columbia, I would sometimes get homesick at night. I always wanted to write home, but I couldn't afford international postage, so all I ever did was cry myself to sleep...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: That's when I'd remember a poem that means something like, wheresoever someone is, the twin moons in the night sky are always the same, and if we look at the moons, even the greatest distances are nothing.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Does Siesta have any songs like that...?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: The old man clears his throat. His beard slightly twitches, as though he remembers something, and starts singing a song stiltedly.
The volcanic ash slowly spreads, covering half the sky.
Each day I linger, aside my dreams â™ª
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: I've lost my way, I'm a fowl without wings â™ª
I grasp at hope, I'm holdin' on out â™ª
Oh on the road, will I come tumblin' down â™ª
And maybe somethin' scares in me, if tomorrow's sun I see â™ª
But I'm just headin' far, I'm no wanderer â™ª
...I'm just headin' far, I'm no wanderer â™ª
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: 'Cause right out there... I've been lookin' to be â™ª
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Lady Ceylon.
Schwarz! What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I had a few missions for Rhodes Island, but I came as soon as I was finished with them.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It took me forever to find you. I'd been searching the crowd for the better part of the day. I have your favorite tea in my bag. I'll give it to you as soon as we get back.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: And... I also wanted to come back...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: They see the rocks in their memories crumble, as a magnificent evening glow they had never before seen rises from the top of the volcano.

A pink smoke covers half of the sky and gradually flutters downward toward the ground. Although they did not see it for themselves, they know a memory that belonged only to them has now been forever buried underneath the white volcanic ash.
Am I seeing things... How did the top of the volcano turn white?
attributes.name: Surprised Passerby

attributes.content: What are you talking about? I don't see it...
attributes.name: Curious Passerby

attributes.content: Siesta... has been wiped out.
attributes.name: Regretful Passerby

attributes.content: I think... 'reborn' might be the more appropriate word here.
attributes.name: No Longer Panicked Passerby

attributes.content: I say we remember this day forevermore... How about we call it the 'Volcano Festival?'
attributes.name: No Longer Panicked Passerby

attributes.text: Sweet peaceful dreams to you each evening â™ª
\n\nNot a worry, not a sweat â™ª
For what's gone is gone, and the future will come â™ª
\n\nThe sun will rise tomorrow, happy days â™ª

attributes.content: See you, Siesta.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: See you... Siesta
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: ...Don't be sad, Lady Ceylon. Tomorrow is a new day.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Right... tomorrow is a new day.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Hey! You ugly-ass sheep...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Keep my vinyls out your stinkin' mouth...! No chewin' my limited edition shirt, either!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Watch that lava! Dammit! Heat degrades a vinyl's sound!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You think this gonna wear out my patience? You got another thing comin'. I'd do this ten thousand years...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Dolly! I swear, I'ma feed your clones to the wolves...!
attributes.name: Emperor
